---
title: "Data Access Request"
format:
  html:
    toc: false
---

Researchers who wish to obtain restricted, de-identified datasets are invited to
submit a request using the form below. You must provide your institutional email
address and research purpose before we can evaluate your request.

<form
  action="https://formspree.io/f/mldqlgnq"
  method="POST">

  <h2>Contact Information</h2>

  <label for="name">Name *</label><br>
  <input type="text" id="name" name="name" required style="width:100%;"><br>

  <label for="institution">Institution and Department *</label><br>
  <input type="text" id="institution" name="institution" required style="width:100%;"><br>

  <label for="position">Position (e.g., PhD student, Postdoc, Professor) *</label><br>
  <input type="text" id="position" name="position" required style="width:100%;"><br>

  <label for="email">Institutional Email Address *</label><br>
  <input type="email" id="email" name="email" required style="width:100%;"><br>

  <h2>Project Details</h2>

  <label for="title">Project Title *</label><br>
  <input type="text" id="title" name="project_title" required style="width:100%;"><br>

  <label for="abstract">Short Abstract (150â€“300 words) *</label><br>
  <textarea id="abstract" name="abstract" rows="6" required style="width:100%;"></textarea>

  <label for="questions">Main Research Questions or Hypotheses *</label><br>
  <textarea id="questions" name="research_questions" rows="4" required style="width:100%;"></textarea>

  <label for="analyses">Planned Analyses (e.g., multilevel models, longitudinal models) *</label><br>
  <textarea id="analyses" name="planned_analyses" rows="4" required style="width:100%;"></textarea><br>

  <h2>Data Needs</h2>

  <label for="datasets">Which dataset(s) are you requesting? *</label><br>
  <textarea id="datasets" name="datasets_requested" rows="3" required style="width:100%;"></textarea>

  <label for="modules">Which modules or variable groups are essential?</label><br>
  <textarea id="modules" name="essential_modules" rows="3" style="width:100%;"></textarea>

  <label for="linkages">Any planned linkages with external datasets?</label><br>
  <textarea id="linkages" name="planned_linkages" rows="3" style="width:100%;"></textarea><br>

  <h2>Ethics and Governance</h2>

  <label for="ethics">Has your project obtained (or will it obtain) ethical approval? *</label><br>
  <textarea id="ethics" name="ethics_approval" rows="3" required style="width:100%;"></textarea>

  <label for="committee">Name of ethics committee and reference number (if available)</label><br>
  <input type="text" id="committee" name="ethics_committee" style="width:100%;">

  <label for="protection">Data protection measures at your institution *</label><br>
  <textarea id="protection" name="data_protection" rows="3" required style="width:100%;"></textarea><br>

  <h2>Outputs and Dissemination</h2>

  <label for="outputs">Intended outputs (e.g., journal article, thesis, report) *</label><br>
  <textarea id="outputs" name="intended_outputs" rows="3" required style="width:100%;"></textarea>

  <label for="timeline">Expected timeline *</label><br>
  <input type="text" id="timeline" name="timeline" required style="width:100%;"><br>


  <h2>Submission</h2>

  <p>
    Once submitted, your request will be emailed to the coordinating team for review.
    You will receive a confirmation and follow-up via email.
  </p>

  <button type="submit" style="
    background-color:#0055a5;
    color:white;
    padding:10px 20px;
    border:none;
    border-radius:5px;
    cursor:pointer;
  ">Submit Request</button>

</form>

<p><br>
After internal review, we will inform you whether:
<ul>
  <li>Your request is approved (subject to signing the Data Use Agreement),</li>
  <li>Additional information is required, or</li>
  <li>The request cannot be granted.</li>
</ul>
</p>
